attributes.action: A new General Election due to a loss of confidence in the Labour Government.
attributes.additional_details: To call a new General Election and dissolve the existing government due to a countrywide complete loss of all confidence of this current Labour Government and its breaking of every single one of its manifesto promises.
attributes.background: We would like a new General Election due to the Labour Party breaking every one of their manifesto promises. A complete loss in confidence of this government has ensued throughout the UK and calls are being made for a new General Election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
